articles.author: Jon Sindreu
articles.title: Intel’s Grim Lesson for Boeing: Sometimes Mr. Fix-It Is Too Late - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Like Intel’s ex-CEO, Boeing’s Ortberg is a technically minded leader tasked with rescuing a storied American manufacturer damaged by bean counters
articles.content: One day, fickle investors are applauding business-school alumni for paying big dividends and slashing costs. The next, theyre demanding that engineers take over to make up for lost innovation. Be car… [+691 chars]
